nodes.text: The starhopper was a type of small, fast, hyperspace-capable starship. It only had room for a single pilot and an astromech droid, and could be equipped for long-range communications. Sometime prior to the attack on Tuanul, Vi Moradi and her astromech droid U5-GG were captured in a starhopper by the First Order Resurgent-class Star Destroyer Absolution.
